name: Robert C. BOLUS, Appellant, v. D. Michael FISHER, Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and Andrew Jarbola, District Attorney of the County of Lackawanna, Appellees

parties: Robert C. BOLUS, Appellant, v. D. Michael FISHER, Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and Andrew Jarbola, District Attorney of the County of Lackawanna, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of June, 2002, the Order of the Commonwealth Court, dated October 28, 2001, is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 1277
Robert C. BOLUS, Appellant, v. D. Michael FISHER, Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and Andrew Jarbola, District Attorney of the County of Lackawanna, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 19, 2002.
